com.milk.objed.gui
Class FieldsEditorComponent

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--javax.swing.JComponent
                    |
                    +--javax.swing.JPanel
                          |
                          +--com.milk.objed.gui.FieldsEditorComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, EditorComponent, EditorListener, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class FieldsEditorComponent
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements EditorComponent, EditorListener

This is the component for interacting with FieldsEditors. It just makes a bunch of sub-components and puts them all in a panel.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
See Also:
Serialized Form
